title: Pickup on South Street = Pick up on South Street
creator_credit: Samuel Fuller, Jules Schermer and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
brief_description: Iconic film noir set in New York about a pickpocket who lifts microfilm bearing US secrets from the handbag of the former mistress of a Communist spy. Sam Fuller combines brisk pacing with sizzling dialogue to create a masterful political thriller that plays upon the over-ripe fears of Communism, espionage and political conspiracy. Richard Windmark plays a wonderfully amoral Skip McCoy, a freshly sprung jailbird, trying to play for all best angles, in an increasingly dangerous game he barely comprehends. Also stars the peerless Thelma Ritter as a street-wise grifter and Jean Peters as the louche femme fatale.
